features.title: Shadcn Admin Portal
features.description: Replaced Laravel Nova with custom React admin portal using Shadcn UI

features.title: Slide-in Login Panel
features.description: Modern slide-in login panel using Shadcn Sheet with two-column layout (hero image + form)

features.title: Branding Settings Live Preview
features.description: Split-screen branding settings with live preview of the login panel that updates in real-time

features.title: Project Tracker
features.description: Development activity tracker with changelog, bugs, features, tasks, and previous dev issues

features.title: Provider Company Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive provider company dashboard with header, stat cards, tabbed interface (Overview, Team, Services, Premises, Reviews), inline edit dialog

features.title: Redesigned Services Wizard
features.description: Modern 4-step service request wizard with step indicator icons, card-based selections, two-column participant form, animated progress bar, and improved navigation

features.title: Find Services Slide-out Panel
features.description: Shadcn Sheet slide-out panel replacing the multi-step wizard. Location search via Google Places, service type via Shadcn Select, live provider count badge, search navigates to directory with results.
